title: Multi queue for dataloader when workers > 1
body_html: Recently I have read the implementation of dataloader and get some ideas may be make dataloader faster when use multi prefetch data loader. Currently there is only one index_queue and data_queue, sampler will put batch indices to index_queue, and multi processes will put the single data_queue at the same time , ther is an race condition and would be blocking. May be create an queue per worker should be more efficiently.
